participant-studies-page.introduction: This is the online research platform run by Dr. Sharp at McGill University.
participant-studies-page.descriptor: Below you will find the study (or studies) for which you have registered.
participant-studies-page.instruction: Click the red button to view the consent form. Once you provide consent, you will be able to click the blue button to start (or continue) the study.
participant-studies-page.progress-descriptor: The progress bar will tell you how far along you are.
participant-studies-page.warning: Once you finish a game, please make sure to click "NEXT" until you reach the start of the next game. If you do not do this, you will have to restart the task.
participant-studies-page.title: Your Studies
participant-studies-page.consent-warning: You must read and accept the consent form below before starting the study

errorMessages.emailInvalid: This must be a valid email
errorMessages.unansweredQuestions: There are still invalid/unanswered questions above. Please review your responses above to make sure you have answered each of the questions.
